text: Allah kono manusera jan'ya tara dharera madhye duti hrdaya banana ni, ara tomadera stridera'o yadera theke tomara'yihara’ ka’re phire gecha tadera tini tomadera ma banana ni, ara tomadera posya-santanadera'o tomadera santana banana ni. E-saba hacche tomadera mukha diye tomadera katha. Ara allah‌i satyakatha balena, ara tini'i pathe paricalita karena.
